missing_perms.no_send_perm: I have no permission to send messages in your channel. Pls fix!
missing_perms.self: I lack the permission `{permission}` for this.
missing_perms.self_channel: I lack the permission `{permission}` in the channel {channel} to do this.
missing_perms.other: You lack the permission `{permission}` for this command.
missing_perms.other_channel: You lack the permission `{permission}` in the channel {channel} to do this command.

command.not_owner: Only an owner may run this command.
command.nsfw: This command may only be used in NSFW text channels!
command.guild_only: This command cannot be used in private messages! Use this command in server, where I am.

interaction.no_access: You cannot perform this action because you do not have the required access level.

cooldown.cooldown_command: That command is on cooldown for {time} more seconds
cooldown.cooldown_button: This button is on cooldown for {time} more seconds

help.help: List all available commands the bot has or description of specific command.

show.name: show
show.help: Information will be visible for others (default-true)

command_info.no_command:
The provided command doesn't exist!
Make sure you typed it correctly.
command_info.title: Command help: {command}

description.command_value:
To get more info about a specific command run `/help command:[command]`.
You can also run `/help category:[category]` to show the commands of a specific category.
description.support_value: If you need help with the bot, contact the owner `{owner_name}`.

tokens.help: View the current amount of tokens

amount.name: amount
amount.help: Enter amount which to add to the user

amount.name: amount
amount.help: Enter amount which to remove from the user

remove.not_enough: User lacks required token amount. Enter exact amount to remove all tokens.

full.name: full
full.help: Show TOP tokens earners and spenders?

user.name: user
user.help: Select the user to which to transfer tokens

transfer.not_enough: You don't have the required amount for transfer.
transfer.min: Minimum amount for transfer must be used.
transfer.max: Maximum amount for transfer reached. Either already reached month limit or entered amount is to large.

buy.not_found: Item not found in the shop.
buy.not_enough: You don't have the required amount to buy this item.
buy.unavailable: This item is unavailable for purchase.

add.help: Add an item to the shop

price.name: price
price.help: Enter item's price or 0 if to be free

amount.name: amount
amount.help: Enter item's available amount for purchase or -1 for unlimited

type.name: type
type.help: Enter item's type, if not selected - usual item

duration.name: duration
duration.help: [EXTRA] Enter item's active duration in weeks

target_id.name: target_id
target_id.help: [EXTRA] Enter item's target (channel ID, role ID)

add.done:
**Item created**
Name: %s
Description: `%s`
Type: %s
Price: %d tokens
Amount: %s

setprice.help: Set new price for and item

item_id.name: item_id
item_id.help: Enter item's ID to be changed

price.name: price
price.help: Enter item's price or 0 if to be free

setprice.not_found: Item not found in the shop.
setprice.done: Changed price for an item with ID `%d` to be %d tokens.

setamount.help: Set new price for and item

item_id.name: item_id
item_id.help: Enter item's ID to be changed

amount.name: amount
amount.help: Enter item's available amount for purchase or -1 for unlimited

setamount.not_found: Item not found in the shop.
setamount.done: Changed amount of available items with ID `%d` to be %s.

remove.help: Remove and item from the shop

item_id.name: item_id
item_id.help: Enter item's ID to be deleted

remove.not_found: Item not found in the shop.
remove.done: Item with ID `%s` deleted from shop.

bank.usage: bank [@Logs] [transfer cut] [max transfer] [exchange rate] [min exchange] [max exchange]

transfer_cut.name: transfer_cut
transfer_cut.help: Set bank's cut from transfer actions

max_transfer.name: max_transfer
max_transfer.help: Set maximum tokens user can transfer in month

bank.changed_log: Tokens actions log's channel set to %s.
